Pre-Game Insights: Oklahoma City will attempt to prolong its eight-game win streak with a victory over New York.
The Thunder have gone 15-2 in home games.
The Knicks are 13-6 on the road.
The Thunder are scoring 115.4 points per game while shooting 46.7% from the field.
The Knicks are scoring 118.2 points per game while shooting 49.5% from the field.
